posts.post_content:
SOLD
$50 ea or all 6 for $190 shipped USPS Priority.  Prefer check or f&f.
[url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url]

Lot includes:
Thomas SC 350/30 - half dozen horizontal creases on top half of card
Turner SC 150/30 - corners rounded & creased, rough edges
Sweeney P350 - paperloss (and extra paper) on back, has a wavy feel
Graham P350 -  couple of heavy creases
White SC350-460 OP - multiple horizontal creases on bottom third of card
Sweeney P350 - top right corner clipped, stamp on back

Thanks for looking,
Rob
:)
[url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url]
